products.title: Infusion Asc White Perfect Fit
products.description: Infusion asc white perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their infusion asc range, where advanced solar control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter.

products.title: Blackout Roller, White (Blackout) - Loft Blind
products.description: Order from the skyline (blackout) collection before 10am and select fasttrack at checkout for next working day delivery. Featuring simple, plain colours and a pvc backing to help to block the light out when you need to get to sleep, the skyline (blackout) collection are some of their most popular skylight blinds. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Gloss White Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: White never goes out of style, and this gloss white in particular will provide bright and timeless style. As if it didnt look sleek enough, a surrounding frame gives the blind a seamless feel to it that makes it look integrated into your window. All of that style and sleek white never goes out of style, and this gloss white in particular will provide bright and timeless style.

products.title: Gloss White Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Who doesnt love a glossy finish? Its such a great way to finish off a room and its even better when you have to do next to no work to get it. This gloss white perfect fit venetian will brighten up your conservatory in an instant and its so easy to install youll wonder why y who doesnt love a glossy finish? Its such a great way to finish off a room and its even better when you have to do next to no work to get it.

products.title: Choices Chenille Cotton White Roller Blind
products.description: Stylish, light, bright and supremely luxurious, this choices chenille cotton roller blind is a rolls royce of a window dressing. The soft fabric will add all the cosiness you need to your space while the off-white tones are so easy to use within your decor. Add in your choice of stylish, light, bright and supremely luxurious, this choices chenille cotton roller blind is a rolls royce of a window dressing.

products.title: Quill Chalk Roman Blind
products.description: Create a signature interior with the quill chalk patterned roman blind. Tailored from shimmery chalk-white fabric, this blind will invite a sense of serenity into your space and with its neat and compact design, will prove a practical accessory for dressing any window. The subtle design of silvery feathers adds delicate decorative interest and a soft bohemian vibe. Product id: db-rom1028 fabric colour: chalk material: 60% polyester 40% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Galaxy Glacier White Roman Blind
products.description: Invigorate your living space with the rustic texture and cool white colourway of the galaxy glacier roman blind. The white woven fabric is uplifted from simple to special with the addition of sparkly metallic yarns within the weave. This practical window blind is perfect for creating a sense of serenity in your scheme and will make a light and bright impact in any area. Product id: db-rom1024 fabric colour: glacier white material: 60% polyester 40% viscose lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Destiny Chalk Roman Blind
products.description: The destiny chalk patterned roman blind is a luxurious option for window dressing. The art deco inspired fabric is made even more decorative with additional glitter of metallic yarns woven into the design, resulting in a simple yet shimmering effect. This roman blind is easy to coordinate with a range of settings yet will have a big impact on your space. Product id: db-rom1013 fabric colour: chalk material: 60% polyester 40% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Galaxy Asc Blackout White Perfect Fit
products.description: Part of their galaxy blackout range, where advanced solar control (asc) and blackout properties are combined to create a perfect solution for any room, whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.

products.title: Hive Plain White Perfect Fit
products.description: Hiveplain white perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hiveprivacy non-blackoutrange, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords punched through the face or back of the fabric. Made to measure hive plain white perfect fit pleated blind px71001.

products.title: Gloss Taped Pure Brilliant White Real Wood
products.description: Their premium taped gloss pure white real wood blind features a sleek glossy finish, great for adding polished simplicity into a room. From soft creamy neutrals to trending greys and stone shades, this real wood range adds a modern sleek finish to your windows. A shade that never goes out of trend, this white wooden blind would adds a modern feel at a great price.
